thread.title: 'Doc' has a special message about your future
thread.title_full: 'Doc' has a special message about your future

author: 13abc
title: 'Doc' has a special message about your future
text:
(Gray/CNN) - Actor Christopher Lloyd reprises his iconic role to deliver a special message on 'Back to the Future' Day. October 21, 2015 is the date in the then future that Doc Brown (Lloyd) and Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) travel to in the 1989 film 'Back to the Future II.'
Watch Doc's special message
'Back to the Future Part II' shows off some products that may have seemed farfetched when the film was released in 1989, but now that the day Marty McFly and Doc Brown traveled to in the future has arrived, it's time to compare what predictions came true. Watch video above for full report.
10/21/15! The Future is NOW! Doc Brown has a special message just for you. #BTTF2015
Posted by Back to the Future Trilogy on Tuesday, October 20, 2015
